results.content: I love how this guy injected humor and confidence into his videos.

response.content: Thanks Mark it's been great to hear from you. Congratulations you have completed your course successfully but now please don't stop learning new and exciting things about reactjs. I bought a brilliant reactjs book for my enrolled students and I will send you. Thanks and take care of your self.
